name: Cars with Guns: It's About Time
name_original: Cars with Guns: It's About Time
description:
Travel back in time with your friends in exotic vehicles decked out with guns, missiles, cannons, and more.

Explore various time periods and discover blueprints to create new weaponry.

Work together to save up Credits to unlock new Vehicles and Weapons.

Fast paced vehicle combat for 1-4 players with up to 12 computer opponents. Co-Op and FFA modes available.

The game was designed to be played with xbox controllers, but any controller that works on PC should work.

Cars with Guns was designed to be a fun and easy game to break out when friends are over! There is virtually no wait when loading the game up, you start in your garage and additional players can drop in and out of split-screen by pressing the start button!

Gain points for everything:
Drifting, jumps, flips, destroying the environment, shooting other cars, ramming other cars, knocking other cars out of the arena, running over wildlife, etc. all give points. Whoever has the most points when the chosen time runs out wins!Features:
  • Full Vehicle Physics.
  • Destroyable Environments.
  • Vehicles get dented up, parts blow off.
  • Vehicle customization.
  • Loadout your car with several different weapons systems.
  • Vehicle and Weapons unlock system.
  • 1-4 player split-screen.
  • Garage based world-space menu system.
